reviews.sentence: Nice casino Buffet was good for lunch. Just wish they more updated slots.

The New management of this casino should be fired. 6 years ago when the back room now the high stakes rip off ball room was penny slots the casino was a fun place to go to. Attendants were walking around eager to assist and cash you out now too much has changed too fast. No more benefits for the everyday average person only benefits for the Elite spending thousands of dollars. When a business turns against their regular customers and starts labeling everything ELITE there is a huge problem that says we only care for the Elite members. Recently the 3rd floor south parking garage was converted for Elite VIP parking an empty VIP Elite room was built in the back that is always empty and now recently parking arms for VIP elite card swiping is being added to the parking garages and the member staff advises that parking will be free for Elite VIPS and regulars will pay when staying over a certain time frame valet parking use to be free with tips and now is charged. 30 for expedited valet lol. There are no more attendants unles you win big which is rare as the machine payouts are tighter than a monkeys behind. When you remove the somewhat equal balance and give all perks to only the elites spending crazy money you alienate the middle class who makes up 90 of your customers so why renovate your entire casino to label everything and now even parking for the Elites. You make more money off the middle class players combined than you do for the Elites. Every time a new area pops up or a gate goes up its labeled Elite You may as well put up a water fountain for different ethnicities as this is what you are portraying to your customers. I have a 70 yr old client who gambles 60 week between her and her husband they use to be Elite but was down graded. can you believe this. You can not continue to take in so much money and continue to allow for such an unequally balanced experience for gamblers. I have tons of clients that gamble here and they are angry with all the Elite changes and will stop coming. Why do not you fire your management team and revert back to the kind fun place you were 6 years ago where you could actually win some money have some fun and not be damned for not being an Elite member every corner you turn. Its beyond ridiculous. You need to remove your labels and create a balance casino for gamblers. This Tampa casino can not be the drain hole to support your other properties in Vegas a room costs 100 night to promote gambling you guys charge 50night. The greed keeps adding up with each new renovation you can not sustain continuing in this manner. I have personally witnessed these changes myself and you guys have some serious issues to say the least. I heard you hired a Manager from Vegas one would think he would have made your casino a pleasant place to gamble instead he is increasing your revenue at the cost of your customers. Making money is obvious but when you label people and thieve people its unbalanced and people will get tired of it quickly.

Fun and Games. Glitz of a Vegas Casino. Large selection of slots with variety of coin values 1 cent and upfod choices went from moderate to high end. Rooms are expensive. Lots of remodeling going on. Fees for parking. We enjoyed our day.

Hard rock at Tampa will never see me again. I will not come to gamble at this place if everything is free. We gamble at Vegas and Reno once a month and we lose money most of the time but we get back money as well at least so that we have fun gambling. Not this place. We live in Jacksonville Beach FL and this place is 3 hour drive from us. We decided to check it out. My wife and I went there few weeks ago and spent 4 grand in 2 hours. We could not believe it. We always play same machines thay we play in Vegas and in Reno. The machines were turned down so much that they would not give anything in return not even cherries. We came back and decided to give it another try this week. We thought it was a fluke. This time they gave us a complimentary room for two nights. Guess what. The first night we got there we lost everything again on those same machines. We decided too leave and not even use their comp room yhey gave us because we were so upset and could not stand to stay there a minute longer. We are not new to gambling. We have been doing it for years. We lnow how these machines operate. This place is ripping people off big time. But they will never get a penny from me ever again. We will go to Hard Rock in Hollywood Florida but never to Tampa again.

Too many people with no money in slot machines with only their Players Club card waiting for a drawing every 20 minutes. Used to be my happy place seems like the long time players with the elite status are no longer being catered to. So many changes more garages more renovations. We were in North Carolina last year and went to Cherokee Harahs and now we are getting free airfare 3 weeks today and they seem to have a lot of the older machines and much less renovations. Biloxi or Cherokee. Lost a lot of benefits in Tampa and every drawing not been called in well over a year. Lots of people playing on their phones slot machines while they sit at that empty machine taking up space. Does anybody else have a six digit number instead of a 13 14 digits on their Players Club cards just saying. You asked for my opinion and you have about a hundred of our opinions. But like the president new president said and a panel meeting which we were invited to maybe 14 people many of us left there defeated just by that meeting. I have had the best casino host and enjoyed many years of birthday celebrations there and I am grateful for those Casino Host always.
Not a big fan of the smoking but they are doing a great job updating the place.

this is my honest opinion based on my experience staying at Seminole Hard Rock Casino even though my hotel stay was a comp night I still have the right to be comfortable my room was located on the second floor and they did not have any other rooms available but the handicap Meaning that I did not have a standard bathtub but a stand up shower I felt guilty because I really thought that I should have waited to receive another room but it was already 4 pm and she told me since it was a holiday she was not sure on how long it was going to take to turn over rooms My room was located on the second floor before you entered the spa Seminole Hard Rock is doing with inflation I was quite surprised to see that the spa was located on a that floor and not in the lobby areas The room was very clean but it had a very loud bleach smell housekeeping was extremely nice she greeted me and made sure that I had everything I need it around 7 pm I noticed that my room thermometer was reading 75 so it was extremely stuffy and uncomfortable I called the front desk to report my issue and maintenance was up within 5 minutes he set the temperature to 65 but it never went any lower than 73 I would have been okay with that because I thought I could have opened the window but since I was on the second floor I did not have access to open a window on top of that the room next to me was arguing and I heard security knock on the door a few times I have plenty of options meaning I could have requested another room or I could have checked out because I am only 15 minutes away from the hotel but since this was a comp stay and the beds are quite comfortable I decided to stay until 1030 If this would have been an out of pocket purchase things would have went quite differently on my end.
Lots of reconstruction going on. Parking can be difficult. Once inside it is nice.
Strong stench of cigarettes when you walk in the door hurts an otherwise clean and updated establishment. Poker room was vast and there are some decent food options. All staff was friendly.

Only real casino experience in Florida. Place has been undergoing renovation for some time looks really good. Rooms are in need of updating after all these years. Would like them to have some competition to give a more Las Vegas type experience ie. better comps free booze etc. Have a steak at Council Oaks. Best filet I have ever had.

we will go again. They have updated the facility a lot. The air handling in the casino seems better too. We went there to celebrate our anniversary. We were treated well and had a great time. Dinner at Council Oak Restaurant was outstanding. Valet parking a bit pricey.

Getaway. The hard rock is a nice place to get away for the weekend or just a couple days. It has a beautiful pool unles they ’re comfortable rooms. There are many choices of restaurants which are all very good. There is a Wawa and a burger Across the street if you do n’t want to spend too much money on food. I would rather spend it on gambling. The remodeled rooms are nice and the new addition is very nice.

The newly renovated hotel is a beautiful. The inside is very nice and rooms are clean. Pool area has a very nice setting. Would like to see more areas of the walking space downstairs as non smoking. The air quality throughout the downstairs is horrible with the smell of cigarettes.
Love the renovation lights come on when entering the room cleanliness and service of room great food at Rise.

Very Nice. We stayed in the newly renovated East Wing and it was very very nice. Was quiet was able to get good sleep very nice room and rest room shower double sinks separate toilet absolutely no complaints. Will definitely stay here again. We ordered room service and it was fast and the breakfast was good.
Staff is friendly renovations are beautiful.
I loved the updated room we stayed in. The room was clean and beautiful. Friendly service. We always have a blast playing the slots here. can not wait to come back again.
Love the new renovations. Good burger at the Hard Rock Cafe.
I finally got to see the casino since they got it all revamped this year and it looks amazing. So so beautiful they did a great job. Went here for the Snoop Dog pool party and it was so fun.
Love the renovated hotel and casino.
